page.title: 04ST.MICHAEL'S SCHOOL CONT.
page.content: {ST.MICHAEL'S SHOOL {CONTINUED { {Teaching Staff { The teachers are specialists and they have a class room to themselves and the chidren move around for lessons. There are plenty of activities that go on in the school such as:Sports, Chess, Model Railways, Music and Dancing as well as Science and the usual academic studies.In recent years it has been possible for day pupils to attend as well as boarders. At the age 13 years the pupils take a Common Entrance Examination to move on to Public Schools until they take "O" and "A" level examinations.
